ModMetaData.name: ED-SubspaceTransponder
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 02.00.01 Discussion, Non Steam Downloads and GitHub Repositories of this mod is available at: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=18995 Please Use that Thread for Discussion / Feedback that would like me to reply to. Ideally Bugs should be logged on GitHub although in the discussion thread is also fine.
Allows creation of a Device for contacting passing ships at a distance and guiding them to your colony.
First it must be charged, after the charging has been completed you can set it to entre a transition mode. After transition has been completed a trade ship will arrive in orbit, and the device will enter charge mode again. Only one device can be transmitting at any one time.
